ksql: CREATE TABLE "wallbox_location" (CLIENT_ID VARCHAR PRIMARY KEY) WITH (KAFKA_TOPIC='wallbox_location',VALUE_FORMAT='AVRO'); CREATE TABLE "wallbox_location_chargestatus" AS SELECT status.CLIENT_ID as CLIENT_ID, status.CHARGE as CHARGE_STATUS, location.x as LATITUDE, location.y as LONGITUDE FROM "wallbox_chargestatus" status INNER JOIN "wallbox_location" location ON status.CLIENT_ID = location.CLIENT_ID;
